alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 02 at 5:41AM AKDT until May 02 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 inches. Winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions with low visibility expected. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another band of snow, blowing snow and winds will move over the Bering Strait and St Lawrence Island this morning and cause periods of low visibility. The snow and blowing snow is expected to to continue into this evening. Conditions will improve late tonight as winds slowly decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
